column4: Ubuntu netbook remix 9.04, how do i "Force" wireless to be on. There is an active network in range, and i want to connect to it. But the wlan0 does not list any networks with "iwlist wlan0 scan".
soirry im Very impatient
what does ifconfig show
it show up in the NIC list
please paste.ubuntu.com with the output
you have a wifi hotspot to test on?
what chipset /netbook
its weird how it was there and not working, and now it isnt there at all.
preface with sudo sorry
it just goes to a new line. no output.
wmi not wm
and does ifconfig show correct nic now (something like ath0)
hoped that was ifconfig :)
all i get is eth0 and lo
that is about the netbook remix
why cant i do, "modprobe -r ath5k acer_wmi; modprobe ath5k"?
take a look in hardware drivers and be sure the atheros alternative driver is enabled
is there a wireless switch on the front edge of the netbook
you may need to toggle it ; should it be switched to 'off' at boot , then it would explain the current situation
I would guess in your fiddling that you toggled it to off, thus the need to restart it with it toggled to on
see the link above
if you read the link I provided, you will see you need to convert it before playing it in vlc
you could try with ffmpeg or winff
then try converting with ffmpeg / winff
